title: Exquisite Emerald & Diamond Jhumka - 'Padma Jhumka'
materials: Simulated Pearl (ముత్యం). Features a premium Hyderabad Polish for a lasting shine.
features: Three-tiered Jhumka design. The top features a floral motif with a central emerald. The middle tier showcases a intricate filigree pattern, while the lower tier is a bell-shaped dome with a pearl drop. Full CZ setting. The Jhumka is meticulously handcrafted with traditional Telugu design elements, blending floral and geometric motifs.
colors: Gold (సువర్ణం) with sparkling white CZ diamonds
accented by a vibrant green emerald and a lustrous white pearl.
occasions: festivals (పండుగలు) such as Diwali (దీపావళి) and Sankranthi (సంక్రాంతి)
and special occasions like seemantham (సీమంతం) or half-saree functions (లంగా ఓణి వేడుక). These Jhumkas add a touch of elegance to any attire.
description: A testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship, these Jhumkas are a blend of tradition and modern aesthetics. The high-quality CZ diamonds offer exceptional brilliance, rivaling real diamonds. The Emerald accent adds a regal touch. They are lightweight and comfortable to wear, making them ideal for long events. The classic design ensures they will remain a cherished heirloom for generations.
